item.title: Org-mode
item.description: Config org-mode Configuring TODOS Workflow states In the file itself: Org mode files can be configured by adding workflow states to the beginning of the file,like so: #+TODO: TODO IN-PROGRESS WAITING DONE In the Emacs-configure file Add the following after the (require ‘org) line: (setq org-todo-keywords '((sequence "TODO" "IN-PROGRESS" "WAITING" "DONE"))) To activate the workflow states, restart Emacs.
